languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} размечает на поле боя область 3×3.
Затем он и все его союзники, у которых в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} есть кто-либо из противников в этой области, немедленно совершают по одиночной атаке, которую позволяет оружие, против случайного противника в этой области.

traits.locale_text:
The Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Tactician, that have Line of Sight to any of the enemies inside seleted zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within that zone they can target with their weapons.

The Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Tactician, that have Line of Sight to any of the enemies inside seleted zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within that zone they can target with their weapons.

The Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Tactician, that have line of sight to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy they can target with their weapons within this zone.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.

Затем он и все его союзники, у которых в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} есть кто-либо из противников в этой области, немедленно совершают по одиночной атаке, которую позволяет оружие, против случайного противника в этой области.
languages.original_text:
The Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Tactician, that have line of sight to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy they can target with their weapons within this zone.

traits.locale_text:
Тактик размечает на поле боя область 3×3.
Тактик и все его союзники, у которых в зоне видимости есть кто-либо из противников в этой области, немедленно совершают по одиночной атаке, которую позволяет оружие, против случайного противника в этой области.

Тактик размечает на поле боя область 3×3.
Тактик и все его союзники, у которых в зоне видимости есть кто-либо из противников в этой области, немедленно совершают по одиночной атаке, которую позволяет оружие, против случайного противника в этой области.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}在战场上选择一片3×3的区域。
此后包括战术专家在内的所有盟友，只要是{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内有该片区域内的敌人，就可以立刻朝该片区域内的随机一名敌人进行一次单体攻击。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}在战场上选择一片3×3的区域。
此后包括战术专家在内的所有盟友，只要是{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内有该片区域内的敌人，就可以立刻朝该片区域内的随机一名敌人进行一次单体攻击。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} designa una zona de 3×3 en el campo de batalla.
Todos los aliados (incluido el maestro táctico) que puedan trazar {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} hasta cualquier enemigo situado dentro de la zona designada efectúan inmediatamente un único ataque contra un enemigo aleatorio de esta zona que sea un objetivo válido para sus armas.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} designa una zona de 3×3 en el campo de batalla.
Todos los aliados (incluido el maestro táctico) que puedan trazar {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} hasta cualquier enemigo situado dentro de la zona designada efectúan inmediatamente un único ataque contra un enemigo aleatorio de esta zona que sea un objetivo válido para sus armas.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} wählt auf dem Schlachtfeld eine Zone von 3×3 Feldern aus.
Alle Verbündeten, inklusive des Meistertaktikers, die eine direkte {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} zu Feinden innerhalb der ausgewählten Zone haben, führen sofort einen Einzelangriff auf einen zufälligen Feind in dieser Zone aus, den sie mit ihren Waffen erreichen können.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} wählt auf dem Schlachtfeld eine Zone von 3×3 Feldern aus.
Alle Verbündeten, inklusive des Meistertaktikers, die eine direkte {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} zu Feinden innerhalb der ausgewählten Zone haben, führen sofort einen Einzelangriff auf einen zufälligen Feind aus, den sie mit ihren Waffen in dieser Zone erreichen können.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} sélectionne une zone de 3 × 3 cases sur le champ de bataille.
Tous les alliés, y compris le maître tacticien, qui ont en {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} des ennemis situés dans la zone sélectionnée lancent une attaque ponctuelle immédiate contre un ennemi aléatoire à l'intérieur de cette zone qu'ils peuvent cibler avec leurs armes.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.

traits.locale_text:
Le Tacticien sélectionne une zone de 3 × 3 cases sur le champ de bataille.
Tous les alliés, y compris le Tacticien, qui ont en {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} des ennemis situés dans la zone sélectionnée lancent une attaque ponctuelle immédiate contre un ennemi aléatoire qu'ils peuvent cibler avec leurs armes à l'intérieur de cette zone.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}が戦場の3×3の範囲を選ぶ。
選択した範囲内にいる敵が{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}にいる、戦略の達人を含むすべての味方は、その範囲内にいる、自身の武器でターゲットにできるランダムな敵1体に対して、即座に単体攻撃を行う。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}が戦場の3×3の範囲を選ぶ。
選択した範囲内にいる敵が{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}にいる、戦略の達人を含むすべての味方は、その範囲内にいる、自身の武器でターゲットにできるランダムな敵1体に対して、即座に単体攻撃を行う。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g}, çatışma alanında 3×3'lük bir bölge seçer.
Seçilen bölge içindeki herhangi bir düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattına{/g} alan tüm dost birimler (Usta Taktisyen de dâhil), bu bölge içinde bulunan ve silahlarıyla hedefleyebilecekleri rastgele bir düşmana anında tek saldırı gerçekleştirir.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.
